column2: we beat the rush when we arrived
column3: and there was only one person ahead of us waiting for a table. Even so
column4: we had to wait 30 minutes to be seated
column5: in the FREEZING outside. There's one heat lamp for the whole patio area
column6: and my girlfriends and I crowded around it. Still
column7: it barely kept the tops of our heads warm. And we were in the way of all the service staff that
column9: needed to walk into the closed Barnaby's next door every couple of minutes. So really
column10: I don't know why they had the heat lamp out there at all
column11: but if they are going to bother using it
column12: it should be in a better location.
